Docs.param: The content to send as the body of the request.
Docs.summary: Creates or updates an entity to a collection. Existing entity is matched using its unique guid if supplied or by its unique attributes eg: qualifiedName. Map and array of collections are not well supported. E.g., array<array<int>>, array<map<string, int>>.
